title: Charles A. Berg
text:
Charles Allen "Charlie" Berg (October 15, 1927 – January 22, 2014) was an American farmer and politician.
Born in <a href="Graceville%2C%20Minnesota">Graceville, Minnesota</a>, Berg went to the West Central School of Agriculture in <a href="Morris%2C%20Minnesota">Morris, Minnesota</a>. Berg was a farmer and cattle breeder. He served on the <a href="Chokio%2C%20Minnesota">Chokio, Minnesota</a> School Board. Berger also served in the <a href="Minnesota%20State%20Senate">Minnesota State Senate</a> from 1973 to 2002. At different times, he was a <a href="Democratic%20Party%20%28United%20States%29">Democrat</a>, <a href="Republican%20Party%20%28United%20States%29">Republican</a>, and Independent. He died in <a href="Minneapolis%2C%20Minnesota">Minneapolis, Minnesota</a>.
